description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows kernel denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-43520), apply the corresponding KB updates for your Windows version:

1. Identify your Windows version and architecture.
2. Download the appropriate update package from the official Microsoft Update Catalog:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
   - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5044286](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044286)
3. Install the update by running the downloaded package.
4. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- Ensure that your system is running one of the specified Windows versions mentioned above before applying the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
- This update addresses a denial of service vulnerability that can affect system stability and security.
